entry.title: Remnants_Of_The_Fallen - Shadow Walk (Feat. Choi Jun Yong of Day of Mourning) - 가사

link.title: Remnants_Of_The_Fallen - Shadow Walk (Feat. Choi Jun Yong of Day of Mourning) - 가사

entry.content:
Digging deeper
into the uncharted soil
Made no trail of the past
that only left spoil
Followed only the unguided
scent of my stride
A celebration of the fools
And those who will not make
or try an effort
to make something count
Rather live in the shadow
of someone less
Someone less than
all you could be
All of those words
Which promise did they serve
And through all the self-defense
have you found trust
So long we have seen
But never cared to live
Drifting under
the gravity of apathy
The most sickening
thoughts are always found
in one's realm
To deny is to never be one
with your name
More voices will bring us down
Like in torrential rain
you will drown
All of those once friendly faces
Nothing more than
the ghosts of the past
Revel in the pretentious
chains of humanity
A fragile chemistry
Domesticated in design
Not giving a second
thought to question
or to carry forth
Cause we all walk alone
We are the shadow walk
False hallucinations are
what they are
Exposing your darkest thoughts
An attempt in vain to try
and fix the frame
In pursuit of the misguiding flame
The change in state of their minds
They push you away
Tattered through
the howling storm
you try to sway
The voice echoes in your head
You have no more left to give in
The ocean beckons
inside you drown
Solemnly puts you in your sleep
Your hollow shadow
is all you have
To the burning sun you raise
your sacrament of uselessness
Only you can realize
for unto their schemes
it leads downward
More voices will bring us down
All of those once friendly faces
Nothing more than
the ghosts of the past
But we all pray
Revel in the pretentious
chains of humanity
A fragile chemistry
Domesticated in design
Not giving a second
thought to question
or to carry forth
Cause we all walk alone
We are the shadow walk
Will you succumb to ones
that will let you down
No we don't give a second
thought to question
or to carry forth
Cause we all walk alone
We are the shadow walk
This journey with you and me
Who scores the highest
is up to your move

entry.title: Remnants_Of_The_Fallen - Answer Beyond (2016 Ver.) - 가사
entry.content:
The cycle breaks now
Endless waste
Those who failed
those who lied
Those who won
severed more
Why chase this absolution
Life began with self-perfection
Living lies
thousands more
Clarify and redefine
So the plague is iron-wrought
Not stopping
aiming for your life
We've witnessed potentials
but all has gone to waste
Already regress is calling
We've accomplished nothing
because we can't accept
What use have us now
As weak as a worm
To symbolize your weakness
pain shows itself
Humiliated body
Soul forged in fake
We’ve come so far away
in our conquest
Extending new horizons
to find ourselves
in our coffins
laid to rest
This earthly boundary
you try to crack and master
But in the end pulling
our disaster ever faster
Who will care
when you share
That you bare
the same old scare
And history never began
without its error
But in the end pulling
our disaster ever faster
We’ve come so far away
in our conquest
Extending new horizons
to find ourselves
in our coffins
laid to rest
This earthly boundary
you try to crack and master
Until you find out
that our flaws are meant to be
meant to be
Even as saints we cannot hide
The limitations we’re born with
Repeating same mistakes again
That’s given birth by our folly
They're ringing in your ears
The whispers
blessed with vile lies
Turned against their masters
Lies you have grown and fed
Mind you gave subject
and strength
We’ve come so far away
in our conquest
Extending new horizons
to find ourselves
in our coffins
laid to rest
This earthly boundary
you try to crack and master
But in the end pulling
our disaster ever faster
Even as saints
we cannot hide
The limitations
we’re born with
As the lord of creation
we failed our only home
We’ve come so far
We’ve reached the end
of the path in sight
Can you see
through the disguise
This is the answer beyond

link.title: Remnants_Of_The_Fallen - Revive In Fire (Feat. Yul of End These Days) - 가사

entry.content:
The thrust of right
Stand firm against authority
In this world I gave up caring for
I found myself
in the eye of the storm
You will be condemned
By those conquered
by their geed
Express your suffering
Their blinded eyes
cannot trace you here
Doubt or silence
the unspoken rite
Questioning your royalty
Submerged in faithless apathy
Still drunk on feast
of the fallen kings
The corruption
I can feel it spread
In my vein
as I seek my way
On this map
I will paint your horrors
The vivid nightmare
of my world
Will you set fire
on this field of endless rain
Or can you serve
and become your own savior
Still unable to make another move
Deterred by this pointless war
Flesh torn and scorched
An everlasting curse
And when you feel
your world collapse
The pressure
it lets you make your stand
Why turn your back
on all you've sowed
Don't hide your shame
confined in failure's gaze
Let your apprehension feed
To not have wasted
Any sense we left behind
They watch as your desire fade
Life or death no certain odds
We move unseen
through our impaired sensors
The constellations of the prophets
never showed me the path
Running scared with blackened eyes
With blackened eyes
over the wall
The balance is lost
Now can you triumph
over the force of the system
or invent your own
And when you feel
your world collapse
The pressure
it lets you make your stand
Why turn your back
on all you've sowed
Don't hide your shame
confined in failure's gaze
You thought the cold
put out your fire
But I'm the harbinger
I am the source of my pain
The aftermath of the bygone days
They lead my way
Light the torch anew
We pray that the gods
guide ourselves
save ourselves
But in turn we have crossed
out all the truth
Never realized the mistakes
that I've made
Never yearned for more
or never less
The gods dictate
The fate is in their hands
Four words of lies
The man will serve
the man will serve
The gods dictate
That you must serve
as if slaves will serve
But we know we're creators
We have come to doubt
the sacrament of masters
The lesson learned
in two eternal enemies
Identify the unfolding
of true nemesis
Transcendence of the souls
to the higher place of the divine
And when you feel
your world collapse
The pressure
it lets you make your stand
Why turn your back
on all you've sowed
Don't hide your shame
confined in failure's gaze
You thought the cold
put out your fire
But I'm the harbinger
I am the source of my pain
The aftermath of the bygone days
They lead my way
Light the torch a new

Raise your hands above
the bidding for deceptive
day has hence arrived
No logic nor sanity

Decadence wrong persistence

Beneath the warm lights

The tyranny rise again
Sworn freedom back

shake again no more
His presence replaced

I will not become a tool
in this game

Caught in the gaze of

these ancient shackles

These manipulative

Negligence bred econocide

are feeding your masters

And follow blindly
their promises of wealth
In the halls of our

The breeding ground for

Passing worn-out

To simply extend the

Which only amount to
lack of serenity

Blend with those who knelt down
All your life
you can't see through
The great wall of deception

the divine minds

forget all you've tried

use a language of my own

the remnants of the past

far away from here

you can't see through
